assets.notes: Primary web server for customer-facing applications
Hosts core business applications and APIs
Central file storage for all departments
Development workstation with access to source code

criticality_definitions.critical: Systems essential for business operations. Downtime causes immediate revenue loss or regulatory violation.
criticality_definitions.high: Important systems supporting key business functions. Downtime causes significant operational impact.
criticality_definitions.medium: Systems supporting regular business activities. Downtime causes moderate inconvenience.
criticality_definitions.low: Non-essential systems. Downtime has minimal business impact.
